property.name: text
property.description: Styling for the text elements of a chart.

property.name: color
property.description: The CSS color to use for text.

property.name: outline
property.description: Styling for the outline of text elements of a chart. Outlines are used to make text readable above other chart elements.

property.name: color
property.description: The CSS color to use for the text outline.

property.name: width
property.description: The number of pixels of solid outline to have around the text.

property.name: halo
property.description: The number of pixels of halo falloff to have around the outline of the text.

property.name: lines
property.description: Styling for the line elements of a chart.

property.name: base
property.description: The CSS color to use base lines.

property.name: major
property.description: The CSS color to use major lines.

property.name: minor
property.description: The CSS color to use minor lines.

property.name: groups
property.description: An array of item colors for each different chart group.

property.name: line
property.description: The CSS color to use for lines.

property.name: fill
